name: Bird RPG Demo
description:
Bird RPG is a small side scrolling RPG with simple flight mechanics.

This demo will likely be the end of the project.

Included in the demo:

  • A few quests to complete.
  • Some enemies to fight.
  • A shop to visit.
  • One premade map along with several procedurally generated ones.
  • World map to access other areas.

Take a look!
